text: Ian Eagle ( ; born February 9, 1969) is a sportscaster with CBS and the YES Network. His jobs include: *NFL play-by-play on CBS *Brooklyn/New Jersey Nets play-by-play *Full Court Press host *College Football on CBS play-by-play *College Basketball on CBS play-by-play *Has covered boxing *College track- and-field on CBS play-by-play *Tennis on CBS play-by-play *Bagels and Baseball host *Syracuse Orange football, men's basketball, and lacrosse play-by-play *New York Jets Radio Network Studio host/play-by-play *Power Performances presented by Courtyard by Marriott co-host *NBA Action host *Nets Magazine *NFL on Westwood One/Dial Global play-by-play *College Basketball on Westwood One/Dial Global play-by-play *Tennis Channel play-by-play *New York Jets preseason play-by-play Category:Lacrosse announcers Category:Boxing broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:Tennis broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:Living people Category:1969 births
title: Ian Eagle
